TICKETY TACKETY


Tic tac toe with computer and online multiplayer functionality.

Built using AngularJS, Yeoman, Firebase, JQuery, Javascript, HTML, CSS.

Click to see site

INC'D


A notetaking app for entrepreneurs.

Built using Ruby on Rails, MongoDB, JQuery, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Slim.

Click to see site

DISH!


A dish recommendation website for Hong Kong. Admins can add restaurants through FourSquare.

Built using Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, RABL, Handlebars, JQuery, CoffeeScript, HTML, CSS, Slim, JSON, OAuth, LeafletJS.

Click to see GitHub repo

MEATY CHRISTMAS CALENDAR


An advent calendar for people who prefer meat over chocolate.

Built using Javascript, HTML, CSS, quickly deployed on Heroku using Ruby and Rack.

Click to see site

HONG KONG HACKNIGHTS


A landing page for HK HK, an excuse for developers to get together twice a month to code. Co-founder along with Josiah Hatch. Subscribe to our newsletter soon.

Built using Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, HTML, CSS.

Click to see site

FRESH HIKES FINDER


Prototyped at the Open Data Hackathon from Jan 25-26 with Sherin Siew. Scrapes the air pollution index hourly combined with hiking data to look for the "healthiest" hiking routes in Hong Kong. Candidate for the GovHK Data.One app competition.

Built using Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, JQuery, Javascript, RSpec, Mechanize, CronJob

Click to see GitHub repo
